member.summary: Common settings for scale-out message bus implementations.

member.summary: The maximum length of the outgoing send queue. Messages being sent to the backplane are queued up to this length. After the max length is reached, further sends will throw an InvalidOperationException.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IStringMinifier.Unminify(System.String)
member.summary: Reverses a call that was executed at least once previously on this instance of without any subsequent calls to sharing the same argument as the call that returned .
member.param: A minified string that was returned by a previous call to .
member.returns: The argument of all previous calls to that returned . If every call to on this instance of has never returned or if the most recent call to that did return was followed by a call to sharing the same argument, may return null but must not throw.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IStringMinifier.RemoveUnminified(System.String)
member.summary: A call to this function indicates that any future attempt to unminify strings that were previously minified from may be met with a null return value. This provides an opportunity clean up any internal data structures that reference .
member.param: The string that may have previously have been minified.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager
member.summary: Provides access to performance counters.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.ConnectionsConnected
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the total number of connection Connect events since the application was started.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.ConnectionsReconnected
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the total number of connection Reconnect events since the application was started.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.ConnectionsDisconnected
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the total number of connection Disconnect events since the application was started.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.ConnectionsCurrentForeverFrame
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the number of connections currently connected using ForeverFrame transport.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.ConnectionsCurrentLongPolling
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the number of connections currently connected using LongPolling transport.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.ConnectionsCurrentServerSentEvents
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the number of connections currently connected using ServerSentEvents transport.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.ConnectionsCurrentWebSockets
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the number of connections currently connected using WebSockets transport.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.ConnectionsCurrent
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the number of connections currently connected.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.ConnectionMessagesReceivedTotal
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the total number of messages received by connections (server to client) since the application was started.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.ConnectionMessagesSentTotal
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the total number of messages received by connections (server to client) since the application was started.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.ConnectionMessagesReceivedPerSec
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the number of messages received by connections (server to client) per second.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.ConnectionMessagesSentPerSec
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the number of messages sent by connections (client to server) per second.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.MessageBusMessagesReceivedTotal
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the total number of messages received by subscribers since the application was started.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.MessageBusMessagesReceivedPerSec
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the number of messages received by a subscribers per second.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.ScaleoutMessageBusMessagesReceivedPerSec
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the number of messages received by the scaleout message bus per second.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.MessageBusMessagesPublishedTotal
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the total number of messages published to the message bus since the application was started.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.MessageBusMessagesPublishedPerSec
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the number of messages published to the message bus per second.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.MessageBusSubscribersCurrent
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the current number of subscribers to the message bus.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.MessageBusSubscribersTotal
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the total number of subscribers to the message bus since the application was started.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.MessageBusSubscribersPerSec
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the number of new subscribers to the message bus per second.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.MessageBusAllocatedWorkers
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the number of workers allocated to deliver messages in the message bus.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Infrastructure.IPerformanceCounterManager.MessageBusBusyWorkers
member.summary: Gets the performance counter representing the number of workers currently busy delivering messages in the message bus.
